title: Atlas Systems Partners with SonderMind to Automate Provider-Payer Data Exchange
description: Atlas Systems' PRIME®, a provider data management engine and real-time data exchange platform, announced its partnership with leading behavioral health provider SonderMind. PRIME® Provider Payer Connect (PPC) will be used by SonderMind to streamline data exchange from SonderMind to payer, delivering near-real-time updates.
content:
Atlas Systems' platform will help streamline SonderMind's data exchange to drive interoperability and real-time updates for SonderMind's robust network of providers, health systems and payers

EAST BRUNSWICK, N.J., Aug. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Atlas Systems' PRIME®, a provider data management engine and real-time data exchange platform, announced its partnership with leading behavioral health provider SonderMind. PRIME® Provider Payer Connect (PPC) will be used by SonderMind to streamline data exchange from SonderMind to payer, delivering near-real-time updates.

Atlas Systems' FHIR-compatible platform for healthcare provider data exchange - PRIME® - is an AI-enabled powerful engine that works with health systems and payers alike to meet constantly evolving data needs and takes away the burden of data updating. PRIME® streamlines end-to-end provider lifecycle management, covering onboarding, data validation, ongoing monitoring, credentialing, roster reconciliation, and mock audits.

Atlas Systems' PPC will enable SonderMind to consolidate data for payers into a single, user-friendly Provider Data Management Engine and platform. Through the interoperable PRIME® platform, health plans can be updated in real time, assuring accuracy and saving time for everyone involved.

Speaking on the client engagement, Venugopala Chalamala, Founder & CEO, Atlas Systems, said, "Over the last two decades, our focus has remained on bringing technology solutions to streamline healthcare operations with a slew of products tailored for providers, payers and health systems. Atlas Systems' AI-powered, automated payer data sync enables faster payments and compliance, reducing administrative overhead, saving time and lowering claim denials - thus optimizing healthcare operations. We are excited to be partnering with SonderMind to help ensure that data is accurate, compliant and easily managed."

As a company which combines technology and human connection, SonderMind has been at the forefront of leveraging technology to streamline its operations. SonderMind currently delivers in-person and virtual therapy in all 50 states and Washington, D.C., and psychiatry in 27 states. SonderMind's 13,000+ providers deliver high-quality care, while accepting national, local, Medicare, Medicare Advantage, and VHA insurance plans.

Atlas Systems is a trusted technology partner delivering AI-driven solutions and IT services to healthcare, life sciences and allied industries. With three core offerings—PRIME®, ComplyScore®, and AInfinity—Atlas enhances provider lifecycle management, cybersecurity and third-party risk management, compliance, data and AI services for healthcare organizations. With 20+ years of expertise, Atlas provides scalable and compliant IT solutions, seamlessly integrating with enterprise systems to enhance workflows, efficiency, and overall business outcomes. For more details, visit: www.atlassystems.com
summary: Atlas Systems' PRIME® provider data management engine and real-time data exchange platform, has partnered with SonderMind to streamline provider-Payer data exchange. The partnership aims to drive interoperability among Sondermind's network of providers, health systems and payers. Atlas Systems' Payer Connect (PPC) will enable Sonder Mind to consolidate data for payers into a single, user-friendly Provider Data Management Engine and platform. The platform can update health plans in real time, ensuring accuracy and efficiency for all parties involved. Atlas's Founder & CEO, Venugopala Chalamala, said the partnership aligns with Atlas's focus on providing AI-powered, automated payer data sync, reducing administrative overhead, and lowering claim denials.
shortSummary: Atlas Systems' PRIME® platform will assist SonderMind's data exchange, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and near-real-time updates, enhancing healthcare operations.

scraped_sources.text:
Atlas PRIME® is ranked Best Provider Data Management Platform of 2025 by MedTech Breakthrough → Read More
Complete Provider Lifecycle Management Solution
Drive accuracy, efficiency, and compliance with an end-to-end solution that simplifies provider operations across health plans and systems.
Trusted by global leaders
Accurate provider data is essential to delivering quality care, streamlining operations, and meeting regulatory demands. But without a unified approach, managing provider data across the many moving parts of the provider lifecycle becomes complex, error-prone, and resource-intensive. A centralized lifecycle approach reduces risk, increases visibility, and saves time—for everyone involved.
The Hidden Costs of Fragmented Provider Lifecycle Management
Healthcare organizations—both payers and providers—are under growing pressure to manage provider data efficiently, accurately, and in compliance with evolving regulations. Yet most teams are still juggling fragmented tools, redundant workflows, and inconsistent formats across departments and partners. Too many systems, too much manual work, and not enough accuracy lead to:
- Manual workflows that slow down onboarding and updates
- Constant back-and-forth with providers and payers
- Missed deadlines, compliance risks, and audit exposure
- Duplicate data entry across multiple systems
- Inaccurate directories leading to patient frustration and lost revenue
Why healthcare organizations TRUST Atlas PRIME®
Atlas Systems delivers a centralized Provider Lifecycle Management (PLM) solution through PRIME®—automating every phase from credentialing and onboarding to data validation and compliance monitoring. Designed for both payers and providers, it reduces administrative burden, improves data integrity, and ensures regulatory alignment at scale.
For Providers and Health Systems
For Payers and Health Plans
20+ years of provider data expertise
Winner of 2025 “Best Provider Data Management Platform” Award by MedTech Breakthrough
"Distinguished Vendor” in Gartner's Hype Cycle for US Healthcare Payers 2024
PRIME® Supports Every Step of the Provider Lifecycle
Our Provider Lifecycle Management solution brings together technology, automation, and 20+ years of deep healthcare expertise to cover every stage of the provider lifecycle:
Provider Data Management
Maintain 95%+ accurate provider data through primary-source validation, direct outreach, self-service portals, and support for payer-specific formats.
Provider Credentialing and Enrollment
Automate credentialing from document collection to payer-specific enrollment, reducing onboarding time and eliminating manual delays.
Provider-Payer Data Exchange
Validate and submit rosters to multiple health plans through PRIME® Provider-Payer Connect, with support for custom formats, FHIR, and automated reconciliation.
Provider Directory Fulfillment
Generate ADA-compliant, CMS-ready directories on demand, with built-in formatting, accessibility, update management, and compliance support.
Provider Compliance Monitoring
Track licenses, certifications, sanctions, and expirations in real time with automated alerts and continuous monitoring to keep your network compliant and audit-ready.
Appointment Wait Time Compliance
Support CMS wait time compliance with secret shopper surveys, reporting, and end-to-end monitoring to meet the 90% threshold.
AI-Driven Healthcare. Human-Centered Impact.
Your trusted partner in provider lifecycle management
FAQs about provider lifecycle management
How does provider lifecycle management software streamline credentialing and compliance?
With Atlas Systems, you can automate credentialing workflows, conduct primary source verifications, and track compliance milestones in one place. This reduces delays, helps you avoid missed deadlines, and makes your audit trail easier to manage.
What provider lifecycle management solutions does Atlas Systems offer?
Atlas Systems offers end-to-end provider lifecycle management solutions that cover onboarding, credentialing, directory validation, monitoring, and contract management. You can use the platform to manage the entire provider relationship from start to finish.
How does Atlas Systems’ provider lifecycle management platform integrate with existing payer systems?
You can integrate the platform with your current claims systems, credentialing tools, and directories using APIs or secure data exchanges. This helps you maintain real-time updates without changing your core infrastructure.
How does AI and automation improve provider lifecycle management?
AI and automation allow you to scan, validate, and update provider records with minimal manual effort. These features help you flag incomplete data, trigger alerts for renewals, and keep everything in sync with regulatory timelines.
Can Atlas Systems' provider lifecycle management software reduce provider onboarding times?
Yes. By digitizing form intake, automating document checks, and streamlining communication between payers and providers, you can significantly shorten onboarding time and reduce administrative burdens.
How does Atlas Systems' provider lifecycle management tool help with contract management?
The system tracks provider contracts, renewal dates, and rate schedules in one dashboard. You can set reminders, review terms, and manage documentation in a centralized place.
Can Atlas Systems customize its provider lifecycle management platform to fit specific payer needs?
Yes. You can configure workflows, data fields, and reports to match your internal processes and compliance needs. Whether you manage a regional network or a national health plan, the platform adapts to your requirements.

Atlas PRIME® is ranked Best Provider Data Management Platform of 2025 by MedTech Breakthrough → Read More
A Complete Provider Lifecycle Management Solution
Seamlessly collect and manage provider data with automated solutions to ensure compliance, efficiency, and accurate data exchange
Trusted by global leaders
A Unified Approach to Provider Data Accuracy and Compliance
Accurate provider data is critical to ensuring timely reimbursements, meeting regulatory mandates, and improving patient access. Yet most healthcare organizations still grapple with siloed systems, inconsistent formats, and manual processes that make data management slow, error-prone, and costly.
Health plans are under pressure to maintain compliant directories, reduce claim denials, and enhance member experience. Meanwhile, providers face credentialing backlogs, payer-specific demands, and mounting administrative burden.
PRIME® by Atlas Systems Powers Provider Data for Health Plans and Health Systems Alike
PRIME® by Atlas Systems Powers Provider Data for Health Plans and Health Systems Alike
PRIME® by Atlas Systems is an AI-powered, end-to-end solution that empowers both health plans and provider organizations to manage provider lifecycle with speed, accuracy, and confidence. With FHIR compatibility, seamless system integration, and built-in automation, PRIME® replaces manual processes and fragmented workflows with a single, intelligent platform.
For health plans and payers, PRIME® simplifies regulatory compliance, improves directory accuracy, and reduces the risk of audit failures and claim denials.
For providers and health systems, PRIME® streamlines credentialing, automates roster submissions, and eases the administrative burden of working with multiple plans.
Why healthcare organizations TRUST Atlas PRIME®
20+ years of provider data expertise
Winner of 2025 “ Best Provider Data Management Platform” Award by MedTech
“Distinguished Vendor” in Gartner's Hype Cycle for US Healthcare Payers 2024
How PRIME® Supports Payers and Providers
PRIME® by Atlas Systems delivers a full suite of provider lifecycle management solutions, tailored to the needs of both health plans and provider organizations. PRIME® combines automation, real-time data, and deep healthcare expertise to help you work smarter and stay ahead of regulatory demands.
For Health Plans and Payers
For Providers and Health Systems
Provider Data Management
Ensure 98% provider data accuracy and regulatory compliance with a proven validation model that uses primary-source outreach and streamlined update workflows.
Provider Directory Fulfillment
Produce ADA-compliant, print-ready PDF directories that meet CMS mandates. We handle formatting, accessibility standards, and update cycles on your behalf.
Mock CMS and State Audits
PRIME® simulates CMS and regulatory audits, identifies risks in your data, and helps your team remediate errors before they trigger compliance issues.
Appointment Wait Time Compliance
PRIME® offers a complete, CMS-compliant solution with secret shopper surveys to measure appointment wait times for in-person and telehealth services.
Provider Engagement and Data Validation
Enable providers to review and update their own data using an intuitive self-service portal, reducing manual outreach and ensuring a low-friction validation experience.
Support for All Provider Types
PRIME® is built to support large, complex networks—individual practitioners, group practices, hospital networks, or delegated entities—with flexible workflows and centralized controls.
Roster Integration and Submission
PRIME® Provider-Payer Connect integrates seamlessly with leading PDMS and EHR platforms. Submit accurate rosters to multiple payers with minimal effort and faster turnaround.
Provider-Payer Data Exchange
PRIME® PPC automates data exchange with all participating payers through a FHIR-compatible platform, reducing errors and administrative burden.
Provider Data Administration
Manage provider data updates from terminations and specialty changes to location details through one centralized platform.
Provider Compliance Monitoring
Track licenses, sanctions, and credential expirations across your network. Monitor real-time feeds and provides alerts, helping you stay compliant without added workload.
Provider Enrollment and Credentialing
Streamline enrollment with automated workflows, document management, and primary source verification. Reduce onboarding delays and simplify provider participation in payer networks.
Training and Compliance Attestations
Deliver structured, trackable training modules—including CMS SNP MOC, HIPAA, and more—to meet regulatory standards and ensure readiness across your team.
Improving Provider Data for a Leading NY Health Plan
A major New York health plan partnered with Atlas PRIME® to improve the accuracy of its provider directory. Through targeted outreach, automation, and expert support, PRIME® delivered verified data with greater completeness, timeliness, and quality — enhancing both compliance and member experience.
We have used PRIME® to validate our provider data and the accuracy level has moved up to 98%, which is unheard of. The biggest differentiator in PRIME® is their primary data verification model, which means they reach out to every single provider.”
- Provider Data Quality Leader, Leading NY Health Plan

Atlas PRIME® is ranked Best Provider Data Management Platform of 2025 by MedTech Breakthrough → Read More
Provider data management solutions for enhanced accuracy and efficiency
We Help Keep Your Provider Data Accurate & Compliant
Why provider data management is important
Keeping provider data and directories up to date is a complicated and challenging task – one that few payers have the time or resources to manage. Provider staff are also overworked and struggle to handle requests from multiple payers. As a result, this adds difficulty for payors working with provider offices and is only compounded by constantly changing, uncooperative, or unengaged provider staff.
Failure to remain compliant with Federal and state regulations can have huge consequences: fines, brand damage, and poor member experiences. Provider Data Management (PDM) plays a pivotal role by helping payors maintain, manage, and validate provider information. Whether it’s contact details, specialties, or availability, having access to accurate provider data is essential for delivering the best possible care to patients.
The atlas advantage
Atlas’ PRIME® solves this problem with primary source validation: a unique, gold-standard system grounded in direct outreach to contracted health systems, provider groups, and individual practitioners. Our many years of experience doing this in a streamlined fashion enables us to achieve better results at a lower cost compared with a health plan trying to do it themselves.
We also make sure your directory adheres to Federal (CMS) compliance standards, state regulatory compliance such as CA SB137, and the requirements of the No Surprises Act. Our solutions are also designed to be compatible with FHIR, facilitating seamless integration and data exchange.
To minimize provider abrasion and maximize compliance, we meet providers where they are – whether that’s a phone call, self-service portal, or roster (with support for custom formats and direct/API integrations).
PRIME® also utilizes an intuitive, browser-based dashboard – an all-in-one window into your findings and attestation progress. You can use our AI-driven Ask PRIME® engine to ask almost any question that you would like to answer from your data – with answers arriving in seconds!
Unmatched success rate
We offer convenient, user-friendly attestation channels - including a state-of-the-art self-service portal - achieving success rates of 95% in validating provider data.
Key Benefits:
- Provider data validation at the source
- Less than one month of implementation to go-live
- Full audit transparency
- Intuitive, browser-based dashboard with near real-time results
- AI-powered tools
Self-service validation
Our new Self-Service Portal (SSP) makes it much easier for providers to double-check and correct their own data. The intuitive platform can condense hundreds of columns of data into just a few, making updates simple and straightforward, and also allow optimized views of providers’ data.
The SSP dramatically eases the providers’ burden while making our own systems more efficient – a remarkable step forward in low-friction provider data collection. Its format is reminiscent of an Excel spreadsheet, which customers find intuitive to use, and the technology in the background allows us to embed business rules that can mitigate the risk of error and oversight.
Key Benefits:
- Reduce provider abrasion
- Improve self-service validation speed
- Eliminate errors from manual spreadsheets
AI-powered dashboard
Our intuitive, browser-based dashboard provides an all-in-one window into your findings and attestation progress in near real-time. You can also use our AI-driven Ask PRIME® feature to ask almost any question that you would like to answer from your data – with answers arriving in seconds!
Key Benefits:
- Customized dashboard for near real-time results
- AI-powered tools to help you achieve more insights with less digging
CMS Appointment Wait Time compliance
For health plans with products on the federal exchange, the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) will require plans to conduct annual ‘secret shopper’ surveys to measure and document appointment wait times for various products and markets in their network starting in January 2025. Participating health plans are required to achieve a 90% compliance rate and this process cannot be done in-house, but by an independent third-party partner not affiliated with the health plan.
This requirement presents at least two potential benefits to the plan. First, it can serve as a useful audit of your network --one that allows you to check your directory accuracy with a small but statistically valid sample. Second, with some design creativity and the addition of a few well-structured questions, this survey process could contribute meaningfully to the health plan’s NCQA accreditation efforts.
Key Benefits:
- Over 12 years of experience conducting secret shopper surveys on behalf of health plans
- Includes full statistical analysis and reporting
- Ensure compliance with an end-to-end solution
Why Choose Atlas Systems?
Provider data validation at the source
Minimize provider abrasion
Ensure compliance with complex and ever-evolving regulations
Cost-effective, responsive, and fast-moving partner
FAQs About Provider Data Management Solutions
How can organizations get started with implementing Atlas Systems' provider data management solution?
Organizations can start by partnering with Atlas Systems to assess provider data workflows, configure platform settings, and set up real-time updates aligned with operational needs.
What sets Atlas Systems apart from other provider data management solutions?
Atlas Systems combines real-time data updates, configurable workflows, FHIR compatibility, and compliance with healthcare standards to deliver a complete provider data management system.
How does Atlas Systems handle real-time provider data updates?
Atlas Systems captures provider updates from multiple systems, normalizes the information, and pushes accurate data back into payer and provider directories without delays.
Is Atlas Systems’ provider data solution HIPAA-compliant?
Yes, Atlas Systems’ provider data management software is designed to meet HIPAA compliance requirements for handling protected healthcare information.
How do providers update their data within Atlas Systems’ platform?
Providers can update their information through self-service portals or integrated workflows that feed directly into the Atlas Systems platform for validation and reconciliation.

argos_summary: Atlas Systems has partnered with SonderMind to enhance data exchange and interoperability through its PRIME® platform, which streamlines provider data management and real-time updates for health systems and payers. The AI-enabled PRIME® Provider Payer Connect will facilitate accurate and efficient data consolidation, reducing administrative burdens and improving compliance. This collaboration aims to optimize healthcare operations by ensuring timely and accurate provider information across SonderMind's extensive network.
